cot: The query uses data from the users and posts tables, but does not utilize the postHistory table. This meets 1.5 points out of 2 (0.5 point deduction for missing postHistory).
The query includes the display name of the user (implicitly through the subquery), the tags of the posts, and the comment count for each post. All three required columns are present.
The query correctly filters results to only include posts by the user named Mark Meckes through a subquery on the DisplayName.
The query correctly filters results to only include posts that have no comments by checking CommentCount = 0.
